idea-plugin.name: ZipSprite
idea-plugin.description:
ZipSprite - A cute animated sprite that moves as you type!

Features:

  • Draggable sprite overlay on your IDE
  • Customizable size
  • Smooth animation triggered by typing
  • Load custom sprite animations from ZIP files
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Version 1.0.0 - Initial Release

ZipSprite - A cute animated sprite for your IDE!

  • Draggable sprite overlay
  • Customizable size and animation speed
  • Smooth 24-frame animation
  • Toggle visibility from View menu

Compatibility: IntelliJ IDEA 2024.3+ and all JetBrains IDEs

action.description: Show or hide the draggable ZipSprite animation
